title: Alpine Red Stag Hunt
description: Hunt trophy Red Stag in the majestic Southern Alps. Package includes luxury lodge accommodation, experienced guide, and field preparation of trophies.

title: Wilderness Tahr Adventure
description: Challenge yourself with a hunt for the elusive Himalayan Tahr in rugged alpine terrain. Helicopter access to remote hunting spots included.

title: Fallow Deer Hunt
description: Experience the thrill of hunting Fallow Deer in New Zealand's diverse landscapes. Perfect for hunters seeking a classic deer hunting experience.

title: Elk Hunting Expedition
description: Hunt the majestic New Zealand Elk in the remote wilderness of Fiordland. This premium package includes helicopter access and luxury accommodations.

title: Rams Mountain Hunt
description: Chase trophy rams across New Zealand's rugged mountain terrain. This challenging hunt requires good fitness and determination.

title: Premium Combination Hunt
description: Our signature package offers opportunities for multiple species including Red Stag, Tahr, Chamois, Fallow Deer, and Wild Boar across diverse New Zealand terrain.
